articles.description: Follow live text, Test Match Special commentary and in-play clips from day three of the fifth Ashes Test between England and Australia at The Kia Oval.
articles.title: Ashes build-up: England prepare for one-innings shootout with Australia

articles.description: England face Malawi in their second Pool B match at the Netball World Cup in Cape Town - follow BBC radio commentary and live text updates.
articles.title: Netball World Cup: England v Malawi - radio & text

articles.description: Max Verstappen passes McLaren's Oscar Piastri to win an incident-packed wet sprint race at the Belgian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Verstappen beats Piastri to Belgium sprint victory

articles.description: It is a relief that Keira Walsh's knee injury is not her ACL but her World Cup is still in the balance, says England's record goalscorer and BBC Sport pundit Ellen White.
articles.title: 'Relief but Walsh's World Cup still in the balance'

articles.description: England's Joe Root is bowled by Todd Murphy, falling nine runs short of another century on day three of the fifth Ashes Test at The Oval.
articles.title: 'He's livid with himself' - Root bowled by Murphy for 91

articles.description: In her third BBC Sport column, GB long jumper Jazmin Sawyers discusses
articles.title: Netflix series & structured league can help athletics thrive - Sawyers

articles.description: Darcy Graham scores two of Scotland's three tries in a World Cup warm-up win over Italy at Murrayfield.
articles.title: Two tries for Graham as Scotland beat Italy

articles.description: Watch the highlights as France edge past Brazil thanks to Wendie Renard's late header at the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Late Renard header gives France win over Brazil

articles.description: The Saudi Pro League's financial clout has "changed the market" for transfers and elite clubs "need to be aware of what is happening", says Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola.
articles.title: Saudi league has changed the market - Guardiola

articles.description: Captain Wendie Renard scores a late headed winner as France beat Brazil in a thrilling Group F game in Brisbane at the 2023 Fifa Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Renard heads late winner as France beat Brazil
